remarks: Parameterize the Pythagorean triples.  If ` A ` , ` B ` , and ` C ` are naturals, then they obey the Pythagorean triple formula iff they are parameterized by three naturals.  This proof follows the Isabelle proof at ~ http://afp.sourceforge.net/entries/Fermat3_4.shtml .  This is Metamath 100 proof #23.  (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 19-Apr-2014.)
statement:
pythagtrip $p |- ( ( A e. NN /\ B e. NN /\ C e. NN ) -> ( ( ( A ^ 2 ) + ( B ^ 2 ) ) = ( C ^ 2 ) <-> E. n e. NN E. m e. NN E. k e. NN ( { A , B } = { ( k x. ( ( m ^ 2 ) - ( n ^ 2 ) ) ) , ( k x. ( 2 x. ( m x. n ) ) ) } /\ C = ( k x. ( ( m ^ 2 ) + ( n ^ 2 ) ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A k m n $.
$d B k m n $.
$d C k m n $.
